margin.description: the margin property defines the space outside the border of an element. It controls the amount of space between an element's border and adjacent elements in the layout.
whenNotApplied: parent container has property : flex, inline-flex, none, grid, inline-grid.
When the element is : inline, absolute positioned, float

margin.description: margin: top right bottom left. Used to set the margins for all four sides of an element individually
whenNotApplied: parent container has property : flex, inline-flex, none, grid, inline-grid.
When the element is : inline, absolute positioned, float

margin.description: margin: top x-axis bottom. Here "top" Specifies the margin for the top side of the element, "x-axis" Specifies the margin for the right and left sides of the element and "bottom"  Specifies the margin for the bottom side of the element.
whenNotApplied: parent container has property : flex, inline-flex, none, grid, inline-grid.
When the element is : inline, absolute positioned, float

margin.description: margin: y-axis x-axis. Here "y-axis" Specifies the margin for the top and bottom sides of the element and "x-axis" Specifies the margin for the left and right sides of the element.
whenNotApplied: parent container has property : flex, inline-flex, none, grid, inline-grid.
When the element is : inline, absolute positioned, float

margin.description: Sets the margin above the element.
whenNotApplied: parent container has property : flex, inline-flex, none, grid, inline-grid.
When the element is : inline, absolute positioned, float

margin.description: Sets the margin to the right of the element.
whenNotApplied: parent container has property : flex, inline-flex, none, grid, inline-grid.
When the element is : inline, absolute positioned, float

margin.description: Sets the margin below the element.
whenNotApplied: parent container has property : flex, inline-flex, none, grid, inline-grid.
When the element is : inline, absolute positioned, float

margin.description: Sets the margin to the left of the element.
whenNotApplied: parent container has property : flex, inline-flex, none, grid, inline-grid.
When the element is : inline, absolute positioned, float
